Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Hernandez Velazquez
Reviews.Content: I Actually bought this to start with my Audiovisual business and well... to tell the truth I was expecting something,.... well... Good... But when I tried it, I Use every lens, every Filter and Every single thing that came into the package... and it was really really amazing, everything looks better than expected and works perfectly, this is the very best Starter kit... Just Saying!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Accessory Package
Reviews.Author: Laurie Christianson
Reviews.Content: Great bundle, although the accessories are absolutely top of the line they are a good entry point to figure out what you may need in the future, with out the huge financial outlay. The camera is phenomenal, easy to use and very intuitive.  The touch screen is a great addition, allows for easy experimentation for lighting conditions and such.  I am upgrading from the G9 and this is a good entry level professional camera.  I have not had the opportunity to use everything but am looking forward to being able to experiment with all the additional accessories and lenses included with the package.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, ISO 100-12800, Expandable to 25600 and DIGIC 5 Image Processor for high speed and excellent image quality
3.0" Vari-angle touch screen LCD flips out and tilts for viewing from a wide variety of angles. Operation is highly intuitive and allows you to control your focus points from the LCD
9-Point All Cross-Type AF System and Full HD Movie Mode with Continuous AF for shooting photos and videos in Live Mode
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses
3 Canon Lenses: EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS, Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III & EF 50mm f/1.8 II
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital SLR Camera Body with 5 Lens Kit including 3 Canon: EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS, Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III & EF 50mm f/1.8 II Lens + Backpack + 32 GB & Deluxe Accessory Bundle
